text: Roger Rogers Browne Jr. (April 13, 1930 - October 11, 2024) was an American actor. He was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. He was known for his role as Drake in the Greek movie It Happened in Athens."Elders React to Seeing Their Black and White Photos in Color for the First Time". YouTube. Retrieved March 3, 2020. He also played Mars in Vulcan, Son of Giove and Mars, God of War. He was also known for voice dubbing 800 movies. He also appeared as himself in the Fine Brothers Elders React YouTube series. Browne died on October 11, 2024 from a short-illness in Burbank, California at the age of 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American YouTubers Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Cincinnati Category:Disease-related deaths in California
title: Roger Browne
